responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "B92765974709B752AAC295A9B4B4C605", "The shipments here have been delayed lately, but there\'s not much that can be done about it. On most days, I stand here just waiting for the first sign of a caravan approaching. Usually this is an ordinary courtesy for the porter, but these days we are in the habit of waiting for what may or may not arrive, as many hindrances assail even the sturdiest of hauls in this ramshackle livelihood of ours. I\'d hardly recognize you if it weren\'t for your cloak. Will you stay awhile?")
name: MADD_0008_BrotherHugh_22
